about_the_game:
Draw your own characters in Doodle Dice Monsters, a fast and strategic turn-based fighter! Form your six character dream team, then fight in tag-team combat in either multi-player or single-player mode: the winner not only gets epic loot, but gets to take one of the defeated Doodlemon for their own! Crush friends and foes alike as you level up and gain epic customization options, like backgrounds, palettes, and more!

Using the draw feature, your team can compose of whomever or whatever you want!
A monster's tier is determined by how long you spend drawing it. You start out with just the default palette, but unlock more as you play the game!



Tagteam wisely to take advantage of type vulnerabilities and each monster tier's unique moveset! Succesfully predicting your opponent's moves and creating favorable matchups will help ensure you leave the battlefield with an extra monster in your collection and epic loot in your inventory.



Features:
  • Draw your own monsters, giving you full cosmetic control
  • Fast, turn-based combat
  • Highly strategic gameplay with a moderate amount of RNG
  • Low barrier to entry
  • Stakes overarch individual matches
  • Unlock backgrounds to show off, palettes to draw with, food to feed your monsters, and more!
  • High replayability
  • 6 Tiers with unique movesets and 7 types with type vulnerabilities
  • Limited use abilities that require thoughtful use
